title: Procurement Officer
job_overview:
We are currently seeking a motivated and detail-oriented professional to join our team. The ideal candidate will support procurement and logistics operations across international markets, particularly within the oil and gas sector. This is a great opportunity to be involved in end-to-end supply chain processes, manage supplier communications, and contribute to the success of high-impact projects.

If you or someone you know is interested, please feel free to reach out directly.
